parameters.name: run_id
parameters.description: ID of the run whose artifacts to list. Must be provided.

parameters.name: run_uuid
parameters.description: [Deprecated, use run_id instead] ID of the run whose artifacts to list. This field will be removed in a future MLflow version.

parameters.name: path
parameters.description: Filter artifacts matching this path (a relative path from the root artifact directory).

parameters.name: page_token
parameters.description: Token indicating the page of artifact results to fetch.

401.description: The request does not have valid authentication credentials for the operation.

404.description: Operation was performed on a resource that does not exist.

get.description: List artifacts for a run. Takes an optional
